model_restructure_problem.name: ProblemRestructuring
model_restructure_problem.description: Based on the initial description, restructure and provide a more detailed version of the problem, including relevant context if possible.

input_parameters.name: initial_description
input_parameters.description: The initial description of the problem

output_parameters.name: detailed_description
output_parameters.description: The more detailed version of the problem

output_parameters.name: context
output_parameters.description: Any relevant context related to the problem

input.initial_description: Find the shortest path between two points in a graph.

output.detailed_description: Given a graph with various nodes and edges, the task is to find the shortest path between two specific points in the graph.
output.context: This problem is commonly encountered in graph theory and can have applications in various fields such as transportation, network optimization, and routing algorithms.

model_refine_with_feedback.name: ProblemRefiner
model_refine_with_feedback.description: Consider the user feedback and refine the problem definition. Output suggested modifications.

input_parameters.name: user_feedback
input_parameters.description: Feedback provided by the user about the problem description

output_parameters.name: refined_description
output_parameters.description: Refined problem description based on user feedback

input.detailed_description: Create a web application that allows users to search and book flights.
input.user_feedback: The problem description is too broad. Please provide more details on the required features.

output.refined_description: Create a web application that allows users to search and book flights. Additional features should include flight comparison, seat selection, and payment integration.

model_final_approach.name: ProblemDefinitionFinalizer
model_final_approach.description: Based on the iterative feedback and adjustments, finalize the problem definition.

input_parameters.name: refined_description
input_parameters.description: The refined description of the problem

input_parameters.name: feedback_history
input_parameters.description: Iterative feedback and adjustments given for the problem definition

input.refined_description: Create a chatbot that can answer customer queries in real-time
feedback_history: The chatbot needs to support multiple languages
Improve the response time of the chatbot

output.final_problem_definition: Design and develop a multilingual chatbot with real-time response capabilities for handling customer queries.
